name: Tangram Puzzles
description:
1. “Tangram Puzzles” is a fun jigsaw puzzle game.
2. The rule is very simple: Drag and drop the pieces without overlapping them and fill the whole shape.
3. Two game modes: Classic mode and Rotate mode.
4. More than 3000 shapes, waiting for you to fill them.
5. Try it now！Maybe once you start, you will love it!

If you have any questions or suggestions, please email us at contact@mudotek.com.
